name: .DM_84 File Extension
summary: Learn about .DM_84 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Demo movie recorded in Wolfenstein - Enemy Territory, a 3D action game (also known as "W:ET"); records gameplay and saves it as a movie that can be played in W:ET; stored in the "\etmain\demos" folder and can be loaded using the "Replays" feature in Wolfenstein.

content: DM_84 files are saved by Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory v. 2.06 and later. Previous versions saved recordings with .DM_82 and .DM_83 extensions.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
